description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below
duration_in_months: With the notice published on 2023-02-17, the notice of proposed procurement is set to expire on 2023-03-06.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: NWS BTU Heater Replacement for Department of National Defence
## Solicitation Number: W8485-237584/A
## Publication Date: 2023-02-17
## Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-06T14:00:00 (Expired)
### Overview
The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation, W8485-237584/A, for the replacement of BTU heaters at 22 Wing CFB North Bay. The procurement is for a total of five items, including duct type portable heaters, vinyl Hitex ducts, air duct adapters, duct adapter plugs, and Hitex ducts.

### Items and Quantities
* Duct Type, Portable Heaters (20 units)
* 12x15' Hitex Ducts w/6 Pitch (-30°F to +350°F) (40 units)
* Air Duct Adapters (20 units)
* Duct Adapter Plugs (20 units)
* 6x15' Hitex Ducts w/1.5-3 Pitch (300°F) (60 units)

### Procurement Details
The procurement is subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement (CLCA) and is reserved for beneficiaries of the Labrador Inuit Land Claims Agreement, Nunavut Land Claims Agreement, and the Inuvialuit Final Agreement.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers who have agreed to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, among others.

### Regions of Opportunity
The procurement is open to beneficiaries worldwide.

### Regions of Delivery
The items are to be delivered to 22 Wing CFB North Bay, Building 109, Hornell Heights, ON, Canada P0H 1P0.

### Contact Information
Fawaz Awan
fawaz.awan@forces.gc.ca
Canada

### Documents and Attachments
The tender documents and supporting attachments, including the bid solicitation and RFP documents, are available for download on the Canada Buys website.

### Important Note
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
